label: A Remarkable Fulfilment of a Condemned Man's Prediction
column6: buried in Montgomery's churchyard after being condemned for highway robbery
column7: predicted that grass would not grow on his grave as proof of his innocence; his prophecy came true as the plot remains barren to this day. A curse seems to follow those connected to his grave
column8: as one accuser became a drunkard and another died mysteriously
column9: enhancing the tale's notoriety and leading to local lore about the cursed spot.
